sentences.en: "I don't want people to call her (her daughter) a bastard and abuse my brothers.My brothers won't have honour in our society until he marries me," she says.
sentences.cn: “我并不希望人们称她（我的女儿）是私生子，也不希望人们辱骂我的表哥，他在我们国家将无法受人尊敬，除非他同我结婚”，她说。

sentences.en: Harry you old bastard! Fancy meeting you here.
sentences.cn: 哈里,你这老家伙! 想不到在这里遇见你.

sentences.en: He was never concerned about being born a bastard.
sentences.cn: 他从不介意自己是私生子.

sentences.en: I had to go early 'cos it's a bastard to get your motor out of the car park.
sentences.cn: 我得早点走，因为从停车场取车麻烦得要死。

sentences.en: I'll get you for that, you bastard!
sentences.cn: 我早晚要跟你算那笔帐, 你这坏蛋!

sentences.en: Life can be a real bastard at times.
sentences.cn: 有时生活会变得麻烦多多。

sentences.en: Michael stood up and yelled. " You lousy bastard , he's my father.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔站起身,大声嚷嚷起来: “ 你算什么东西,你目中无人.
可怜的家伙, 他上当受骗了.

sentences.en: That dumb bastard probably couldn't make a living before the war.
sentences.cn: 这个蠢蛋,在战前八成儿连口饭都混不上吃呢.

sentences.en: The king's bastard plotted to usurp the throne.
sentences.cn: 国王的庶子阴谋篡夺王位.

sentences.en: The poor bastard of a driver could freeze out there.
sentences.cn: 司机那个可怜虫该冻坏了.

sentences.en: The poor bastard! He's just lost his job.
sentences.cn: 那可怜的家伙! 他刚失去了工作.

words.tran_cn: 退化非纯种的；非正宗的
判为私生子；误用；使退化（bastardize的过去分词）
使…品质低落；判定…为私生子

trans.tran_cn: 私生子，杂种，代用品，假冒品，态度傲慢且令人讨厌的人
trans.tran_en: someone who was born to parents who were not married
